name: Stranded (itch) (b3agz)
description:
You Crashed!

Let's not get into the blame game. Someone crashed the ship (it was you) and now you need to figure out how to get off the surface again. Unfortunately, that means taking your high-tech ass out into the ancient ruins of an alien planet to find the things you need.

Oh... watch out for the wildlife.

How to Play

The controls for Stranded are simple. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around and Q and E to rotate. You can also look around a little by holding the right mouse button and dragging around. To pick up crystals and parts or attack enemies, the left mouse button is your friend.

The Goal

You need to collect enough parts and crystals to fix your ship (10 of each). When you do, you win! If you get killed by insectoids, you lose :(

Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023

This game is an entry for DCJam2023, which is a 7-day jam. That being said, I only had 3 days due to the jam clashing with a planned vacation. The game was developed by me, b3agz, with a music assist from BEAT_and_DELETE.

The theme of the jam was "Duality", and my use of the theme is shown in the contrast between the player's futuristic, high-technology character and the ancient world they find themselves in.
